SEARCH
Package passport.application.desktop

Class Translator

java.lang.Object
passport.application.desktop.Translator
public class Translator extends Object
Responsible for managing string translations at runtime. Note: ObjectProperty is used to allow dynamic content updates.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Translator()
    Initializes with the English language by default.
